title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When I press finish in the JAR packager wizard, I receive the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late.
EB: To save the files, I have to quit the wizard, save the files, open the wizard again, and then re-enter all the fields. I should be allowed to create a JAR with unsaved editors. If not, there should be a dialog prompt to allow saving the files.
SR: Fix the JAR packager to allow creation of JAR files with unsaved editors and provide a dialog prompt for saving unsaved files.
